description.text: [Description]: This element defines group identifier on related Subject. It defines group in which the subject belongs to.
[Description]: Define user identify on related Subject. This should be unique as identifier.

[Description]: Java class name implementing jeus.security.base.CredentialFactory interface. Provide public generator containing no parameter. [Value Description]: Java Class Name [Example]: <classname>mypackage.MyPasswordFactory</classname>

[Description]: Define property value of name-value pair to be passed to Credential Factory as optional selection. For detail information on property, please refer to class documentation related to Credential Factory.
[Description]: Explaination on Subject. [Value Description]:Temperary Explaination statement [Example]: <description>A really nide guy!</description>
[Description]: Specific value on property as seletive option. [Value Description]: Property, "password" property value should be encoded as Base 64. [Example]: <value>bXlwYXNzd29yZA==</value>

[Description]: Java class name implementing java.security.Principal interface. This class contains public generator receiving Principal name of String Type. [Value Description]: Java Class Name [Example]: <classname>mypackage.MyPrincipalImpl</classname>
[Description]: Related Principal Name [Value Description]: A String id. [Example]: <name>johan</name>
